altTitles.en: The Villainess Wears an Idiot's Mask
The Villainess Appears to Be a Fool

altTitles.ja: 仮面をかぶった魔術師

description.en:
A magician pretending to be a fool in order to get revenge.

On the day of her unwanted wedding, Winsty awakens as a magician after being brought back to life from being poisoned.

In order to stop the constant attacks from her cousin who wants to be the head of the family and has done evil against Winsty and her parents, Winsty enters into a contractual relationship with a duke from a rival family.

Behaving like a fool and wearing a mask, Winsty actively tries to regain honor and authority and comes face to face with an enormous conspiracy entwined with the empire's emperor.

---
- Official English Translation: [<NetComics>](https://www.netcomics.com/en/comic/the-villainess-behind-the-mask) | [<Lezhin>](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/villainess_mask) | [<Tappytoon>](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-villainess-behind-the-mask)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12261/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://www.netcomics.com/comic/17527)

description.ja:
かたきを取るために仮面をかぶった魔術師ウィンスティ。望まない結婚式を執り行った日に魔術師として覚醒し毒殺の危機から命を取り留めた。
一族のトップの座を狙い両親と自分に残忍な仕打ちをした従妹の相次ぐ攻撃を止めるために、ライバル一族の公爵と恋人の契約を結ぶ。
何も知らないように振る舞う一方で、仮面をかぶって名誉と権利を取り戻すために動いている最中、帝国の皇帝にまつわる巨大な陰謀を知ることとなった。

---
- Official English Translation: [<NetComics>](https://www.netcomics.com/en/comic/the-villainess-behind-the-mask) | [<Lezhin>](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/villainess_mask) | [<Tappytoon>](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-villainess-behind-the-mask)

description.ko:
원수를 갚기 위해 백치 연기를 하는 대마법사

원하지 않은 결혼식을 치르던 날, 대마법사로 각성해 독살 당할 위기에서 되살아난 윈스티.
가주의 자리를 노리고 부모님과 자신에게 패악을 끼친 사촌동생의 계속되는 공격을 막아 내기 위해 라이벌 가문의 공작과 계약 연인이 된다.
백치 행세를 하며 한편으로는 가면을 쓰고 명예와 권리를 되찾기 위해 활약하던 중 제국의 황제와 얽힌 거대한 음모를 마주하게 된다.

---
- Official English Translation: [<NetComics>](https://www.netcomics.com/en/comic/the-villainess-behind-the-mask) | [<Lezhin>](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/villainess_mask) | [<Tappytoon>](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-villainess-behind-the-mask)

description.zh:
被迫举行结婚典礼的当天，温斯蒂被觊觎家主之位的妹妹毒杀，临死时她幡然醒悟，觉醒魔法复活归来。为了抵挡妹妹的不断迫害，温斯蒂决心与敌对家族的公爵签下契约婚姻。一边装疯卖傻，一边带着狐狸面具的她，在寻回家主之位的同时，又与帝国的皇帝发生纠缠，一场大阴谋即将浮出水面。

---
- Official English Translation: [<NetComics>](https://www.netcomics.com/en/comic/the-villainess-behind-the-mask) | [<Lezhin>](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/villainess_mask) | [<Tappytoon>](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-villainess-behind-the-mask)
